description:
1.great hopes make great man. 远大的希望，造就伟大的人物

2.What makes life dreary is the want of motive.没有了目的，生活便郁闷无光。

3.The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today.实现明天理想的唯一障碍是今天的疑虑。

4.If you doubt yourself,then indeed you stand on shaky ground.如果你怀疑自己，那么你的立足点确实不稳固了。

5.If you find a path with no obstacles, it probably doesn’t lead anywhere.太容易的路，可能根本就不能带你去任何地方。

6.Although again sweet candy, also has a bitter day.即使再甜的糖，也有苦的一天。

7.The shortest way to do many things is to only one thing at a time.做许多事情的捷径就是一次只做一件一件事。

8.Dream what you want to dream; go where you want to go; be what you want to be, because you have only one life and one chance to do all the things you want to do.做你想做的梦吧，去你想去的地方吧，成为你想成为的人吧，因为你只有一次生命，一个机会去做所有那些你想做的事。

9.Ideal is the beacon. Without ideal,there is no secure direction; without direction ,there is no life.理想是指路明灯。没有理想，就没有坚定的方向；没有方向，就没有生活。

10.Have an aim in life, or your energies will all be wasted.人生应该树立目标，否则你的精神会白白浪费。
